Name: 明明如月
About the game: This game is a unique round strategy game. You will operate up to 3 heroes to fight with various magical creatures. The roguelike map will make your every adventure full of surprises. The game gives players a high degree of decision-making power from two aspects of strategy and tactics. It is about the success or failure of each adventure to set up your adventure team, match a reasonable lineup, consider the talent, buy the right equipment, move correctly, change the hatred value and release the skills.
